languages.text: "Если бы только это... Надеюсь, Кикеросс и Синисториа сейчас бьются в ужасе от одной мысли, что их безголовые подчиненные потеряли кабалита, которого им сослал на смерть сам Назракей. Сначала они решили поиграть в благотворителей, забрав меня в прозелиты, а теперь... просто упустили. О, хотел бы я видеть Суккуб своими глазами, когда им донесли об этом".

"Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."
languages.original_text: "Если бы только это... Надеюсь, Кикеросс и Синисториа сейчас бьются в ужасе от одной мысли, что их безголовые подчиненные потеряли кабалита, которого им сослал на смерть сам Назракей. Сначала они решили поиграть в благотворителей, забрав меня в прозелиты, а теперь... просто упустили. О, хотел бы я видеть Суккуб своими глазами, когда им донесли об этом".

First they decided to play charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the succubus's face when she was given the news."

First they decided to play charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the succubus's face when she was given the news."

First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

"Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

languages.text: 「ああ、だがそれだけじゃない。キーケロスとシニストリアは今頃、首なし部下がナズラクヘイ自身によって死刑を宣告されたカバライトを失ったと考え、恐怖に身もだえしていることだろう。奴らは最初、俺を改宗者にすることで神の愛を見せようとした。だが今は…俺は変わらなかった。あー、この知らせを受けたときのサキュバスの顔が見たかったぜ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、だがそれだけじゃない。キーケロスとシニストリアは今頃、首なし部下がナズラクヘイ自身によって死刑を宣告されたカバライトを失ったと考え、恐怖に身もだえしていることだろう。奴らは最初、俺を改宗者にすることで神の愛を見せようとした。だが今は…俺は変わらなかった。あー、この知らせを受けたときのサキュバスの顔が見たかったぜ」

languages.text: “噢，而且不仅如此……我希望绮克萝丝和希斯索莉亚也会惊恐不已。那个被纳札骸本人判了死刑的阴谋团成员，却被她们手下那些不长脑子的家伙给弄丢了。她们一开始惺惺作态，让我加入血腥叛党，假装饶了我一命。现在……她们又让我从指缝之间溜走了。不知道那两个血腥魔女听到这个消息时，会露出什么样的表情。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

traits.locale_text: “噢，而且不仅如此……我希望绮克萝丝和希斯索莉亚也会惊恐不已。那个被纳札骸本人判了死刑的阴谋团成员，却被她们手下那些不长脑子的家伙给弄丢了。她们一开始惺惺作态，让我加入血腥叛党，假装饶了我一命。现在……她们又让我从指缝之间溜走了。不知道那两个血腥魔女听到这个消息时，会露出什么样的表情。”

languages.text: «Oh, pero hay más... Espero que Keykeross y Sinisthoria estén retorciéndose de terror ante la mera idea de que sus subordinados sin cabeza hayan perdido al Kabalista que fue sentenciado a muerte por el mismísimo Nazrakhei. Primero decidieron jugar a la caridad convirtiéndome en Prosélito y ahora... dejan que me escape de entre sus manos. Ojalá pudiera ver la cara de la súcubo cuando le dieron la noticia».
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, pero hay más... Espero que Keykeross y Sinisthoria estén retorciéndose de terror ante la mera idea de que sus subordinados sin cabeza hayan perdido al Kabalista que fue sentenciado a muerte por el mismísimo Nazrakhei. Primero decidieron jugar a la caridad convirtiéndome en Prosélito y ahora... dejan que me escape de entre sus manos. Ojalá pudiera ver la cara de la súcubo cuando le dieron la noticia».

languages.text: "Oh, aber es gibt noch mehr ... Hoffentlich winden sich Keykeross und Sinisthoria jetzt vor Entsetzen, wenn sie nur daran denken, dass ihre kopflosen Untergebenen den Kabalisten verloren haben, der von Nazrakhei selbst zum Tode verurteilt wurde. Zuerst spielen sie Wohlfahrt, indem sie mich zum Proselyten machen, und nun ... lassen sie mich entwischen. Ach, ich hätte das Gesicht des Succubus zu gerne gesehen, als sie es erfahren hat."
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, aber es gibt noch mehr ... Hoffentlich winden sich Keykeross und Sinisthoria jetzt vor Entsetzen, wenn sie nur daran denken, dass ihre kopflosen Untergebenen den Kabalisten verloren haben, der von Nazrakhei selbst zum Tode verurteilt wurde. Zuerst spielen sie Wohlfahrt, indem sie mich zum Proselyten machen, und nun ... lassen sie mich entwischen. Ach, ich hätte das Gesicht des Succubus zu gerne gesehen, als sie es erfahren hat."

languages.text: « Oh, mais ce n'est pas tout... J'espère sincèrement que Keykeross et Sinisthoria se tortillent d'horreur à l'idée que leurs subordonnés ont laissé filer le Kabalite condamné à mort par Nazrakhei lui-même. D'abord, ils ont voulu faire preuve de charité en me nommant prosélyte, et maintenant... je leur ai glissé entre les doigts. Oh, comme j'aimerais pouvoir voir le visage de la succube quand elle apprendra la nouvelle ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, mais ce n'est pas tout... J'espère sincèrement que Keykeross et Sinisthoria se tortillent d'horreur à l'idée que leurs subordonnés ont laissé filer le Kabalite condamné à mort par Nazrakhei lui-même. D'abord, ils ont voulu faire preuve de charité en me nommant prosélyte, et maintenant... je leur ai glissé entre les doigts. Oh, comme j'aimerais pouvoir voir le visage de la succube quand elle apprendra la nouvelle ! »

languages.text: "Ah, dahası da var ama. Umarım Keykeross ve Sinisthoria, kafasız hizmetkârlarının, bizzat Nazrakhei tarafından ölüme mahkûm edilen Kabalist'e kaybetmiş olduğu düşüncesiyle, korku içinde kıvranıyorlardır. Öncelikle çok yüce gönüllü davranıp beni bir Zındık yapmaya karar verdiler, şimdi de... Parmaklarının arasından kaçıp gitmeme müsaade ettiler. Ah, haberi ilettiklerinde Sakkubus'un yüzünü görmeyi nasıl isterdim."
languages.original_text: "Oh, but there is more... I hope Keykeross and Sinisthoria are now writhing in horror at the mere thought that their headless subordinates have lost the Kabalite who was sentenced to death by Nazrakhei himself. First they decided to play at charity by making me a Proselyte, and now... they let me slip through their fingers. Oh, I wish I could see the Succubus's face when she was given the news."

Ah, haberi ilettiklerinde Sakkubus'un yüzünü görmeyi nasıl isterdim."
